message.name: ERR_POSITIONSLOTAVAILABILITY_XRV_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this position slot availability as it has been canceled.
You cannot modify this position slot availability as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_FV_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Start date must not be earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONSLOTAVAILABILITY_XRV_FROMDATE_INVALID_FOR_SCHEDULE
message.locale: Start date must be a valid date for the slot's schedule that this position is being assigned to.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONSLOTAVAILABILITY_XRV_ENDDATE_INVALID_FOR_SCHEDULE
message.locale: End date must be a valid date for the slot's schedule that this position is being assigned to.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONSLOTAVAILABILITY_XRV_FREQPATT_FROMDATE_OVERLAP
message.locale: Scheduled work assignments exist that conflict with position slot availability details entered.

message.name: ERR_DAILYSCHEDULE_MRE
message.locale: More than one daily schedule with the same start date at the same location found in database.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONSLOTAVAILABILITY_XRV_DATERANGE_OVERLAP
message.locale: Position slot availability record with the same or overlapping date periods already exists for this slot.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONSLOTAVAILABILITY_XRV_STARTDATE_BEFORE_SLOT_STARTDATE
message.locale: Start date must not be earlier than the start date of the slot.

message.name: ERR_POSITIONSLOTAVAILABILITY_XRV_ENDDATE_AFTER_SLOT_ENDDATE
message.locale: End date must not be later than the end date of the slot.
